name: Break The Habit
content: Shakes and sweats takes my breath
浑身颤抖汗流浃背让我难以呼吸
Can't later rest fight my flesh
不能休息片刻与我的肉体抗争
I'll be okay a couple a day yo
Scratch my neck cash my check
挠我脖子把支票换成现金
Cop pops and meds my problems is
I used to dream a lot
This is me pleading out to God
Break the habit end this madness
改掉习惯结束这场疯狂
Break the habit heal this damage
I've been captive for too long
Pain and pills chains and chills
痛苦和药片项链和寒战
大杀四方直到我老去生病
Flush the rest catch my breath
冲走剩下的东西屏住呼吸
Hands on my chest I'm on the edge
This is me givin' all I got
这就是我付出我的一切
Break the habit end this madness
改掉习惯结束这场疯狂
Break the habit heal this damage
I've been captive for too long
在苍白的月光下与恶魔共舞
Never gonna stop me rock me hop me
永远无法阻止我尽情摇摆
Never gonna block me kill me softly
永远不会阻止我温柔地干掉我
我受够了我已经放下了
你想要什么改变让你付出代价
我受够了我已经放下了
你想要什么改变让你付出代价
Break the habit end this madness
改掉习惯结束这场疯狂
Break the habit heal this damage
I've been captive for too long
